$interpreted: Proud Doctor: Hmm? ...You're the Lady of Seamoon Manor? How may I help you?
Li Hwa: About the sickness you were just describing... Where your patient kept blacking out. What did you use to cure it?
Proud Doctor: Do you have a patient suffering from this disease?
Li Hwa: Yes... Someone very important to me...
Li Hwa: I've tried everything, but I just can't heal her...
Grateful Beast: Ah, it seems the Lady has important business with you. I'll be on my way now.
Proud Doctor: Okay, please take good care of your father.
Proud Doctor: As for curing that strange illness...
Proud Doctor: I still happen to have some medicine left. I'll give it to you, but I'll have to go home first to retrieve it.
Li Hwa: Thank you, Doctor!
Proud Doctor: ...One bag of this medicine won't be enough, though. You'll need at least seven of them to completely treat the illness.
Proud Doctor: If I remember correctly, this decoction requires a rare herb, the coldridge flower...
Li Hwa: Coldridge flower...? I've never heard of that before...
Proud Doctor: It's a rare plant found in the north, and very difficult to come by. It looks very similar to the windtail flower, but with beautiful blue petals.
Proud Doctor: It works miracles in treating this illness.
Li Hwa: I wonder where I could buy some...
Proud Doctor: I have some stockpiled at home, as it happens.
Proud Doctor: How about this: you can pay me for the medicine now, and I'll prepare the decoction for you. You can pick it up from me tomorrow. What do you say?
Li Hwa: Yes! How much will it cost?
Proud Doctor: Coldridge flower will cost you. Seven bags of it... will come to 100,000 Curren.
Li Hwa: (So expensive...! But Lian Hsi needs it...)
Li Hwa: I haven't brought that much with me today. Perhaps I could pay with my jewelry instead?
Proud Doctor: Of course! It's settled, then.
Li Hwa: Okay, thank you so much!
Proud Doctor: I understand how you feel. Don't worry, I'll be sure to bring you the rest of the medicine you need tomorrow~
Li Hwa: I'll go prepare it right away! Thank you!
Li Hwa: Oh, by the way, is there anything I should know about administering the coldridge flower?
Proud Doctor: ...Er, well you should certainly pay close attention to the heat.
Li Hwa: I see. Perhaps I can cook it right here, and you can tell me if I'm doing it correctly?
Proud Doctor: But if you cook it now, it'll be cold by the time you go back and give it to your patient...
Li Hwa: Surely that'd be better than overcooking it and wasting something so precious, though?
Proud Doctor: ...All right, all right. I'll help you prepare it now. Hurry, though, I have other things to be getting on with!
Li Hwa: Thank you! I'll do it right away!
Proud Doctor: Very well, hurry along now. Farewell.
Li Hwa: Thank you, thank you so much!
Lian Hsi: Sister Li Hwa!
Li Hwa: Didn't I tell you to wait for me at Pearl Manor? What if you'd gotten into trouble out here?
Lian Hsi: I can't stay cooped up there forever, it's so boring... I just wanted some fresh air...
Lian Hsi: What's that you've got, Li Hwa?
Li Hwa: I've just received some medicine from the doctor.
Li Hwa: He said he'd cured someone with an illness just like yours. This time it'll work, I'm sure of it...!
Lian Hsi: What's this made of...?
Li Hwa: It has a rare coldridge flower extract inside. It's just what you need.
Lian Hsi: (Coldridge flower? I've never heard of such a thing... But Li Hwa seems so sure...)
Lian Hsi: Ohh, it's so sweet...
Lian Hsi: Gah!
Li Hwa: Lian Hsi? Lian Hsi!
Jing Yu: Li Hwa! Is Lian Hsi okay? She's not at the Manor, so I came looking for you both...
Li Hwa: Oh no, I'd better run and find that doctor...! Look after Lian Hsi for me, I'll be right back!
Jing Yu: Li Hwa?
Li Hwa: Doctor!
Li Hwa: Does that medicine usually cause people to faint right away?
Proud Doctor: Certainly not, it must be an unfortunate coincidence...
Li Hwa: Really? My friend is just a short walk from here, please would you come see her?
Proud Doctor: I-I have another patient to see urgently... I can't right now. I'll take a look at her tomorrow when I give you the rest of the medicine.
Li Hwa: But she's right there...
Proud Doctor: I have to go...!
Li Hwa: What's this... Blue dye... Wait a minute... This is just windtail flower with a blue dye added to it!
Li Hwa: So all that stuff about the coldridge flower was totally made up? That so-called rare herb from the north?
Proud Doctor: ...Of course not. You don't know what you're talking about!
Li Hwa: You're a total fraud! You wouldn't care if your fake medicines ended up killing somebody!
Proud Doctor: A fraud? What proof do you have? How dare you libel me like that!?
Li Hwa: I've got blue dye all over my hands, and still you won't admit it. What kind of doctor are you?!
Jing Yu: Li Hwa... Calm down! You can't treat people that way!
Li Hwa: Get out of my way! This guy's a phoney! I'll teach him a lesson he won't forget...
Li Hwa: Let go of me! Don't let him escape!
Jing Yu: Come on... Go back and take care of Lian Hsi, she's what matters most now!
Li Hwa: (What the... What am I doing...)
Jing Yu: Calm down, let's go back to Pearl Manor...

Model.Text: Hmm? ...You're the Lady of Seamoon Manor? How may I help you?
About the sickness you were just describing... Where your patient kept blacking out. What did you use to cure it?
Do you have a patient suffering from this disease?
Yes... Someone very important to me...
I've tried everything, but I just can't heal her...
Ah, it seems the Lady has important business with you. I'll be on my way now.
Okay, please take good care of your father.
As for curing that strange illness...
I still happen to have some medicine left. I'll give it to you, but I'll have to go home first to retrieve it.
Thank you, Doctor!
...One bag of this medicine won't be enough, though. You'll need at least seven of them to completely treat the illness.
If I remember correctly, this decoction requires a rare herb, the coldridge flower...
Coldridge flower...? I've never heard of that before...
It's a rare plant found in the north, and very difficult to come by. It looks very similar to the windtail flower, but with beautiful blue petals.
It works miracles in treating this illness.
I wonder where I could buy some...
I have some stockpiled at home, as it happens.
How about this: you can pay me for the medicine now, and I'll prepare the decoction for you. You can pick it up from me tomorrow. What do you say?
Yes! How much will it cost?
Coldridge flower will cost you. Seven bags of it... will come to 100,000 Curren.
(So expensive...! But Lian Hsi needs it...)
I haven't brought that much with me today. Perhaps I could pay with my jewelry instead?
Of course! It's settled, then.
Okay, thank you so much!
I understand how you feel. Don't worry, I'll be sure to bring you the rest of the medicine you need tomorrow~
I'll go prepare it right away! Thank you!
Oh, by the way, is there anything I should know about administering the coldridge flower?
...Er, well you should certainly pay close attention to the heat.
I see. Perhaps I can cook it right here, and you can tell me if I'm doing it correctly?
But if you cook it now, it'll be cold by the time you go back and give it to your patient...
Surely that'd be better than overcooking it and wasting something so precious, though?
...All right, all right. I'll help you prepare it now. Hurry, though, I have other things to be getting on with!
Thank you! I'll do it right away!
Very well, hurry along now. Farewell.
Thank you, thank you so much!
Sister Li Hwa!
Didn't I tell you to wait for me at Pearl Manor? What if you'd gotten into trouble out here?
I can't stay cooped up there forever, it's so boring... I just wanted some fresh air...
What's that you've got, Li Hwa?
I've just received some medicine from the doctor.
He said he'd cured someone with an illness just like yours. This time it'll work, I'm sure of it...!
What's this made of...?
It has a rare coldridge flower extract inside. It's just what you need.
(Coldridge flower? I've never heard of such a thing... But Li Hwa seems so sure...)
Ohh, it's so sweet...
Gah!
Lian Hsi? Lian Hsi!
Li Hwa! Is Lian Hsi okay? She's not at the Manor, so I came looking for you both...
Oh no, I'd better run and find that doctor...! Look after Lian Hsi for me, I'll be right back!
Li Hwa?
Doctor!
Does that medicine usually cause people to faint right away?
Certainly not, it must be an unfortunate coincidence...
Really? My friend is just a short walk from here, please would you come see her?
I-I have another patient to see urgently... I can't right now. I'll take a look at her tomorrow when I give you the rest of the medicine.
But she's right there...
I have to go...!
What's this... Blue dye... Wait a minute... This is just windtail flower with a blue dye added to it!
So all that stuff about the coldridge flower was totally made up? That so-called rare herb from the north?
...Of course not. You don't know what you're talking about!
You're a total fraud! You wouldn't care if your fake medicines ended up killing somebody!
A fraud? What proof do you have? How dare you libel me like that!?
I've got blue dye all over my hands, and still you won't admit it. What kind of doctor are you?!
Li Hwa... Calm down! You can't treat people that way!
Get out of my way! This guy's a phoney! I'll teach him a lesson he won't forget...
Let go of me! Don't let him escape!
Come on... Go back and take care of Lian Hsi, she's what matters most now!
(What the... What am I doing...)
Calm down, let's go back to Pearl Manor...
